events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on 2024-05-01, requesting to file a claim for damages.
Claim was categorised as an 'Auto Accident' following review of the initial report indicating a car collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and contact the customer for further details.
The claim was acknowledged with confirmation sent to the customer, assuring prompt processing of their case.
The agent requested relevant documents including accident reports, photos of the vehicle damage, and police statements.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, facilitating timely review of the accident claim.
The investigation team commenced thorough examination of the collision circumstances and the submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the legitimacy of the vehicle damage claim without indications of fraud.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the evaluation of damages and estimated repair costs for the customer's vehicle.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim.
The claim received formal approval, authorizing release of funds to cover the vehicle repair expenses.
Payment was issued promptly to the customer’s repair shop account, ensuring quick initiation of vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed to the customer’s satisfaction.
